tourName: Kerala holiday, hidden gems of India
placesVisited: The Quiet by the River, Malayattoor Forest, Windermere River House, Elakai, Munnar, Ameya, Backwaters, Ginger House Museum Hotel, Fort Cochin, Indian Summer House
generalInfo:
This fabulous tailor made tour takes you around Kerala as part of a suggested 16 day itinerary that does its level best to uncover some of southern India’s natural and cultural hidden gems.

Some of the palatial properties featured throughout this holiday are absolutely stunning and many of the overnight accommodation options have been hand-picked to offer the very best in authenticity, charm and characterful cultural heritage.

The itinerary itself is a mix of old and new with popular highlights combining wonderfully well with lesser-known hidden gems. Even if you’ve had a holiday in Kerala before, this two week tour provides ample excuses for a return visit.

This tour combines the very best of all sides with a range of overnight accommodation options ensuring a unique and personal experience. Book into a boutique hotel, stay in a heritage palace, spend time at a luxury guesthouse; whatever you do, don’t miss out on this all-encompassing holiday in India’s favourite southern state.

dayInfo.description: Depart the UK. Flights can be booked by us and therefore the whole holiday will be protected under our ATOL.
Arrive Trivandrum Airport and transfer to Taleket. Two nights at Taleket.
Transfer to the Kerala backwaters. Three nights at Ameya.
Transfer to the Cochin district. Two nights at the fabulous Chittoor Kottaram.
Day at leisure - or head to Thattekkad Bird Sanctuary.
Transfer to Munnar. Spend two nights at Elakkai.
Explore the tea growing area of Munnar.
Transfer to Muvattupuzha. Three nights at Indian Summer House.
Two days to enjoy the fantastic Indian Summer House.
Transfer to Cochin Airport - fly home.
